meanings.sent1: The mentholated lotion felt cool on my skin.
meanings.sent2: The mentholated candy left a refreshing taste in my mouth.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally used mentholated shampoo on my dog, and now he smells like a mint leaf!
meanings.sent4: The mentholated air in the room cleared my stuffy nose instantly.
meanings.sent5: The mentholated ointment provided a soothing sensation on my sore muscles.

meanings.definition: Having a strong, minty odor or flavor due to the presence of menthol.
meanings.sent1: The mentholated tea was perfect for a cold winter evening.
meanings.sent2: The mentholated gum gave a burst of freshness with each chew.
meanings.sent3: The mentholated ice cream made my mouth feel like an arctic wonderland!
meanings.sent4: The mentholated scent of the candles filled the room with a calming aroma.
meanings.sent5: The mentholated toothpaste left my breath feeling icy and clean.
